entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Rainbow Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:20 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Periods of snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending before morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 29. POP 30%
